#summary Describes the parts necessary in an annotator's code so that resources work in uimaFIT.

= Introduction =

An annotator using resources needs a few parts:
- (java) annotated uri
- binding the resource value and key
- retrieving the resource


= Details =
{{{
public class BannerEntityTagger_AE extends EntityTagger_AE {
	
	final static String MODEL_FILE_KEY = "BannerEntityModelFile"
        // the java annotation
	@ExternalResource(key=UIMA_RESOURCE_MODEL_FILE)
	DataResource uriDataResource;

	@Override
	public void initialize(UimaContext context) throws ResourceInitializationException {
                // getting the value
                URI uri = context.getResourceURI(MODEL_FILE_KEY);
		String bannerModelFile = uri.getPath();	
	}
	
	public static AnalysisEngine createAnalysisEngine(TypeSystemDescription tsd) 
	throws ResourceInitializationException {
		AnalysisEngineDescription aed = AnalysisEngineFactory.createPrimitiveDescription(
		        BannerEntityTagger_AE.class, tsd); 
                // binding
		ExternalResourceFactory.bindResource(aed, MODEL_FILE_KEY, 
		        new File("../nlp/resources/nlp-tools/BANNER/data/models/gene_model_v02.bin"));
			
		AnalysisEngine ae = AnalysisEngineFactory.createPrimitive(aed);
		return ae;
	}
}
}}}
